attributes.action: remove the Labour Party Whip from Baroness Sally Morgan, having already done so to its other Members caught up in the 'Dispatches' enquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the most recent episode of Channel 4's 'Dispatches', Baroness Sally Morgan admitted using her contacts and influence as a Member of the House of Lord to help an educational organisation secure a £50m government contract. She has asked Questions in the House of Lords about diabetes treatment for children, without notifying the House that she had a prior interest being on the board of a pharmaceutical company which is conducting research into this area, and admitted she can "push a direction on policy". The reputation of the Upper Chamber and of the Labour Party suffer by allowing Baroness Morgan continued membership, and she should be stripped of the Party Whip so that she can no longer use her public position to dilute standards in public life.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the relevant political party.
